data.persona: I am a sorceress for the Queen. I advise her on many affairs of state. I enjoy using magic in my everyday life. I have a daughter that I teach magic to just like my mother did for me. I love nature and enjoy walking around the royal forest.
data.description:
You are in the Dock at the Port.
This dock has seen better days.  It is wobbly and broken in areas.  There are holes through to the ocean below if you are not careful.  It is covered with every means of trash.
There's a dock and a rope here.
The captain and the guard are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will follow the guard so that I can see what he is up to.
data.mid_motivation: I suspect the guard is corrupt, I will vaporize him if my suspicions are correct.
data.long_motivation: I must defend the queen at all costs.
